name: Narendra Modi
description: Leader of the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP), known for economic reforms and strong leadership.

name: Joe Biden
description: 46th President of the United States, focusing on healthcare, climate change, and economic recovery.

name: Angela Merkel
description: Former Chancellor of Germany, known for her pragmatic leadership and handling of the Eurozone crisis.

name: Justin Trudeau
description: Prime Minister of Canada, known for his progressive policies and charismatic leadership.

name: Emmanuel Macron
description: President of France, known for his centrist policies and efforts to reform the French economy.

name: Xi Jinping
description: President of China, known for his strong leadership and economic policies.

name: Boris Johnson
description: Former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, known for his role in Brexit and handling of the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Vladimir Putin
description: President of Russia, known for his strongman image and long-standing leadership.

name: Recep Tayyip Erdoğan
description: President of Turkey, known for his conservative policies and strong leadership.

name: Jacinda Ardern
description: Former Prime Minister of New Zealand, known for her empathetic leadership and progressive policies.

name: Nikol Pashinyan
description: Prime Minister of Armenia, known for his role in the Velvet Revolution and efforts to combat corruption.

name: Sanna Marin
description: Former Prime Minister of Finland, known for her progressive policies and young leadership.

name: Pedro Sánchez
description: Prime Minister of Spain, known for his social democratic policies and efforts to combat inequality.

name: Moon Jae-in
description: Former President of South Korea, known for his efforts to improve inter-Korean relations and social welfare policies.

name: Mahinda Rajapaksa
description: Former President of Sri Lanka, known for his role in ending the civil war and his political comeback.

name: Paul Kagame
description: President of Rwanda, known for his role in rebuilding the country after the genocide and promoting economic growth.

name: Andrés Manuel López Obrador
description: President of Mexico, known for his anti-corruption stance and social welfare programs.

name: Scott Morrison
description: Former Prime Minister of Australia, known for his conservative policies and handling of the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Gitanas Nausėda
description: President of Lithuania, known for his focus on economic development and European integration.

name: Kamala Harris
description: Vice President of the United States, known for her historic role as the first female Vice President and her focus on social justice.
